column4: sorry to ask here - but i can not find any info on the web - maybe anyone knows at what time 12.10 will be released?

so there wont be any conference or anything like that? - sorry im not familiar with that topic - im using already for 2 years but never cared and now i am having incopatible noebook - 12.10 will fix most of these things... thats why i am asking :)
